str2: Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
